name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Part 5 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.

First word of six letters.

Ash.

Second word of five letters.

Wept.

Third word of four letters.

Desperate.

Fourth word of three letters.

Cease to live.

Fifth word of two letters.

Initial identity.

Start a new word of seven letters-

Has least hair.

Second word of six letters-

Horse shelter.

Third word of five letters-

Creature.

Fourth word of four letters-

Consumes comestibles.

Last word of three letters-

Ocean.
